name: Parent/Child List Array to Tree Array
note: Convert an data collection in which data have parent/child relation to a tree structure array (relation group by children[] property).
input: Array of data collection with parent/child relation
output: Array of data tree with children[]
author: huangxuping

treeIdPropName.note: 树节点记录的主键属性名称

treeParentPropName.note: 指向父节点id的属性名称

facadeMethod.note: 与外部交互的接口方法

getTreeIdMap.note: 建立Key为节点主键,Value为节点对象的Map

getChildrenMap.note: 建立Key为父节点ID，Value为直接子节点数组的Map

createDirNode.note: 创建根节点数组，子节点放在children属性中；这是一个递归调用函数

caller.note: 上下文环境的引用名称
